feed.title: Enc: Bitcoin cold hardwallet with (proof of creation)

entry.title: Enc: Bitcoin cold hardwallet with (proof of creation)
entry.summary: The author of this message is seeking more freedom and suggests the use of a hard wallet that makes funds unseizable using proof of creation. The idea is detailed on a Github directory and the author believes that the necessary elements to execute the project already exist. The author is not a developer, but has a well-defined concept and provides a link to the Github directory for further details. The message also includes a PGP signature for security purposes. No HTML attachment was included in the message.
